text: 11:23 For truly ¦ Truly NA SBL TH WHFor truly I say to you, if anyone says to this mountain, ‘Be taken up and thrown into the sea,’ and does not doubt in his heart, but believes that what he says is going to happen, 11:23 whatever he says 93.2% ¦ it CT 0.3%whatever he says will be granted to him.
